title: Hair regrowth herb: Study says this ancient medicinal root could help reverse hair loss
description: Hair regrowth herb: A centuries-old Chinese medicinal root, Polygonum multiflorum, is showing promise in scientific research for combating common hair loss. This herb appears to work on multiple fronts, including blocking hair-shrinking hormones and activating natural regrowth signals, offering a potential holistic alternative to conventional treatments.

title: The Susquehanna Seal: Does Pa.’s ancient river hide a prehistoric monster?
description: A river that flows in Pennsylvania is one of the oldest around, so it stands to reason that massive prehistoric beasts once waded in its waters. However, there's another best of legend that's said to still reside within its waves.
